<title level="1" right="Rules">[Basic Magic Weapon](/Rules.aspx?ID=766)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 599 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Many magic weapons are created by etching runes onto them, as described in [Runes](/Rules.aspx?ID=733). The [_magic weapon_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) stat block covers the Prices and attributes of the most common weapons you can make with only [fundamental runes](/Rules.aspx?ID=738).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
